References.title: The ChvG-ChvI two-component system is essential for virulence in Agrobacterium tumefaciens
References.authors: Charles W. Gough, Andrew J. Levy, Stephen C. Winans

References.title: The ChvG-ChvI two-component system controls the acid-inducible genes of Agrobacterium tumefaciens
The ChvG-ChvI two-component system of Agrobacterium tumefaciens regulates the expression of virulence genes in response to acidic pH
